headline: This Magnificent Stock Has Made Many Millionaires -- and Could Make More
summary: Since it went public in 1997, Amazon has delivered a 233,100% gain for investors.  Speaking of international business, it is worth mentioning that more than 70% of Amazon's e-commerce business still comes from North America.

headline: 3 Top Stocks to Buy in 2025
summary: Here's why three Fool.com contributors believe Walmart (NYSE: WMT), Nike (NYSE: NKE), and Dollar General (NYSE: DG) are timely buys heading into the new year.  Jennifer Saibil (Walmart): It's been a great year for retail giant Walmart, and it's likely to get even better in 2025.  In a new and exciting trend, e-commerce has become a major growth driver, and there are several reasons that is likely to contribute to a booming business in 2025.
